source
main {
  lock = prim.newLock();
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  forkTo afterFork;
  t = <<25>>;
  block.sleep(t);
  releaseLock(lock);
  goto end;
}
afterFork {
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  x5 = 10;
}
end {}
----
application/datalog

slide
5
----
application/datalog

slide
40
----
application/datalog

reset
----
application/datalog

source
main {
  lock = prim.newLock();
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  forkTo afterFork;
  t = <<25>>;
  block.sleep(t);
  releaseLock(lock);
  goto end;
}
afterFork {
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  x5 = 10;
}
end {}
----
application/datalog

slide
20
----
application/datalog

slide

query
viz.continueMessage{}
----
application/datalog
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 10}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 11}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 11}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 12}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 12}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 13}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 13}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 14}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 14}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 15}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 15}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 16}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 16}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 17}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 17}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 18}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 18}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 19}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 19}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 20}}.
viz.continueMessage{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 1}, kind: continue{}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 2}}.

reset
----
application/datalog

source
main {
  lock = prim.newLock();
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  forkTo afterFork;
  t = <<25>>;
  block.sleep(t);
  releaseLock(lock);
  goto end;
}
afterFork {
  block.acquireLock(lock);
  x5 = 10;
}
end {}
----
application/datalog

slide
5
----
application/datalog

query
state.ProgramCounter{}
----
application/datalog
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 0, state: running{}, thread: 1, time: 1}.

state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, state: blocked{reason: timer{start: 6, thread: 1}}, thread: 1, time: 7}.

lifetimeMessages
state.ProgramCounter
----
application/datalog
message{idx: 0, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 0, "St": running{}, "T": 1, "TH": 1}}, multiplicity: 1}.
message{idx: 1, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 1, "St": running{}, "T": 2, "TH": 1}}, multiplicity: 1}.
message{idx: 10, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 7, "St": blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, "T": 7, "TH": 105}}, multiplicity: 1}.
message{idx: 100, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 7, "St": blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, "T": 11, "TH": 105}}, multiplicity: -1}.
message{idx: 101, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 7, "St": blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, "T": 12, "TH": 105}}, multiplicity: -1}.

message{idx: 106, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 7, "St": blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, "T": 17, "TH": 105}}, multiplicity: -1}.

message{idx: 110, message: bindings{bindings: {"C": 7, "St": blocked{reason: lock{id: created{thread: 1, time: 2}}}, "T": 21, "TH": 105}}, multiplicity: -1}.

lifetimeMessages
viz.continueMessage
----
